mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngAll.repository.MtngAllMapper.selectListMtngAll */ SELECT MTNG_ID , MTNG_TYPE_CD , CMT_ID , CMT_NM , DGR_CD , OPEN_DTM , CLOSE_DTM , MTNG_PLC , AGE_CD , RMK , STAT_CD , REG_ID , REG_DT , MOD_ID , MOD_DT , DUE_DTM FROM EBS_MTNG WHERE 1=1

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.mtng.mtngAll.repository.MtngAllMapper.selectMtngAll */ SELECT MTNG_ID , MTNG_TYPE_CD , CMT_ID , CMT_NM , DGR_CD , OPEN_DTM , CLOSE_DTM , MTNG_PLC , AGE_CD , RMK , STAT_CD , REG_ID , REG_DT , MOD_ID , MOD_DT , DUE_DTM FROM EBS_MTNG WHERE MTNG_ID = #{mtngId}
